project.objective: BISONet PLUS2 ENH project aims at enhancing innovation capacities of Czech SMEs – Czech SME Instrument beneficiaries and Czech SMEs with high potential for growth. Consortium implementing the project is composed of 2 EEN partner organisations – TC AV CR being the coordinator and JIC being a partner of the project. TC AV CR and JIC will deliver both type of services „Key Account Management services for SME Instrument beneficiaries“ and service „Enhancing innovation management capacities of SMEs“. The total number of service packages to be delivered within the BISONet PLUS2 ENH project is 96 – 88 service packages is dedicated for „Enhancing innovation management capacities of SMEs“ and 8 for delivering KAM services to SME Instrument beneficiaries. The tool to be used to identify needs of SMEs and gaps in innovation management will be „smE-MPOWER Business Innovation Roadmap methodology”.
project.title: Business Innovation Support Network for the Czech Republic – Enhancing the innovationmanagement capacities of SMEs by EEN in 2017-2018
